    Detailed Description

    The HScrollBar class simulates the native Apple kinetic scrolling.

    Member Type Documentation

    enum HScrollBar::Position

    This enum type specifies a the scrollbar position:

    ConstantValueDescription
    HScrollBar::Top0Displays the scroll bar at the top of the parent.
    HScrollBar::Bottom1Displays the scroll bar at the bottom of the parent.

    Member Function Documentation

    HScrollBar::HScrollBar(QWidget *parent = nullptr, Position handlePosition = Position::Bottom)

    The HScrollBar class constructor. It requires a parent QWidget, and the handle position is opcional. By position by default is the bottom.
